AppPreferences.name: AppPreferences
AppPreferences.label: App Preferences
AppPreferences.description: Represents AppPreferences metadata component used in Salesforce deployments and package development.

FullName.description: The unique identifier for this metadata component

enableCustomizeMyTabs.description: enable Customize My Tabs field of AppPreferences metadata component.

enableKeyboardShortcuts.description: enable Keyboard Shortcuts field of AppPreferences metadata component.

enableListViewHover.description: enable List View Hover field of AppPreferences metadata component.

enableListViewReskin.description: enable List View Reskin field of AppPreferences metadata component.

enableMultiMonitorComponents.description: enable Multi Monitor Components field of AppPreferences metadata component.

enablePinTabs.description: enable Pin Tabs field of AppPreferences metadata component.

enableTabHover.description: enable Tab Hover field of AppPreferences metadata component.

enableTabLimits.description: enable Tab Limits field of AppPreferences metadata component.

saveUserSessions.description: save User Sessions field of AppPreferences metadata component.
